channel.title: [508] Many Questions, no awsners. Help?
channel.description:
OK.. So many questions.. I've hosted a 377 server for a year or 2 so far. I feel its need to go up to 508 now.
Here comes the questions :
Q1: Do i need different ports for my portfoward ( 377 = 43594-43594 ) Q2: I run my 508 and it says : '"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07/bin/java.exe"' is not recognized as an internal or extrnal command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . Q3: I do use the 'run' program in the cmd folder of the 508 server right? Not the 'all' program? Q4: Do i need MySQL setup and local host thing need to be running?
*Will update when more comes to mind..*
So yeah, I've been trying to run it for a while now and I've finally gave up and I need some help... If you give me and help and running help, you will get co owner on my (hopefully) soon to be 508 server.
Ok, here are some FAQ..
Q:What source are you using? A: XeloXoft Package v2
Q:Do you have java installed? A: yes, ^Its above in the CMD problem^
*Will update more when more come*
Please help!
- Kingofheaven

item.title: [508] Many Questions, no awsners. Help?
item.dc:creator: @KingOfHeaven KingOfHeaven
item.description:
@KingOfHeaven wrote:

[quote=“i0wnuall, post:4, topic:257011”]q2: Try this:

"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe"

what do you mean try it? Go to it and open it?[/quote]

I went to it and i dont got a java.exe
I have a java, is that it?

*PS: do u got MSN or AIM so we can talk ?

Read full topic
